statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats = '{"wins": 10, "losses": 5}' WHERE username = 'alice_smith';
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats = '{"wins": 10, "losses": 2}', achievements = '{"level": 5}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements = '{"level": 6}' , stats = '{"wins": 12, "losses": 3}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player_stats SET experience = 500, level = 15 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_profiles SET achievements = '{"first_place": 5, "second_place": 3}', stats = '{"kills": 150, "deaths": 50}' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username = 'new_username', stats = '{"wins": 100, "level": 50}', achievements = '{"new_achievement": true}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET level = 60, experience = 50000, wins = 105 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET stats = '{"wins": 10, "losses": 5}' WHERE username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE player_stats SET points = 500, level = 10 WHERE username = 'alice_smith'
UPDATE player_stats SET points = 1000, level = 10 WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE player_achievements SET description = 'Completed on Hard mode' WHERE achievement_id=5;
UPDATE player_stats SET wins = 10, losses = 2 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET email='updated_email@example.com', join_date='2022-01-01' WHERE player_id=123;
UPDATE player_stats SET wins=15, losses=5, games_played=20 WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles WHERE username='example_username');
UPDATE player_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE id=1
UPDATE player_stats SET games_played=10, total_score=500 WHERE player_id=2
UPDATE player_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET games_played = 10, total_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 3;
